newsitem.title: USA: U.S. barges quoted at broadly steady levels.
newsitem.headline: U.S. barges quoted at broadly steady levels.

text.p: U.S. barge rates were quoted at broadly steady levels on the St. Louis Merchants Exchange call session. Two barges traded on Monday versus none on Friday. Trades, bids and offers included:
- Two barges, one each weeks of November 3 and 10, mid-Mississippi (McGregor and south), traded at 220 percent of tariff, up 2-1/2 percentage points from previous bid.
- Two barges, this week, mid-Mississippi offered five points lower at 220 percent, bid at 215 percent.
- Two barges, this week, Mississippi (St. Louis) bid at 180 percent, offered at 185 percent, no comparisons.
- Two barges, next week, Illinois, bid 2-1/2 points lower at 212-1/2 percent, no offer.
- Two barges, next week, lower Ohio, bid 2-1/2 points higher at 207-1/2 percent, no offer.
- Eight barges, two each week April, mid-Mississippi, offered at 170 percent, no bid or comparison.
